text: My galaxy s8+ is rooted and this app used to work. But now since an update all I get is a circle going round and round waiting for the app to load. I suspect they've now changed the app to not work on rooted phones. Can anyone confirm this or has anyone else had this problem

Virtually impossible to get back in if you've lost your login, you need to know your username and 4 digit number, cause if you've forgotten your login you definitely will still remember a randomly assigned number. Darwin award for these guys over here

Awful, would not let me place a bet, tried to log back in and it told me my password was wrong, this password issue happened twice, will be withdrawing the money I put into this app and taking it else where.

This new timeout thing is so irritating and solves nothing. Have 1 star for you trouble.
It's a great app, just be careful. Bet365 are a caring betting firm but gambling can suck you in... be mindful of what you're doing. Be responsible and you'll have a blast <3
The app and company are absolutely shocking.. The amount of times I have had to keep re installing the app and always suspending games for no apparent reason DONT USE BET 365
Great app and best betting site all round, unfortunately I'm banned for nothing and can never use it again, they just won't tell me WHY.
Worst app ever. Is always suspended when you win something or its on the way to win. Always problems with cash out!

Easy to use, still bloody lose though 😢

This is a good betting app however just a second ago my to return went from 366 to 227. This was once I had place the bet and some games have gone my way. If the bet comes in then I'm over hundred down. I have had no other issue using this app and before this I would have gave it 5 starts but its annoying that this has happend, maybe it will change.

Dont payout on early payout bets for some reason, even though they did previously. And I've contacted them through the app and nothing. Also I seem to spend more than I get back on the spins, little chance of winning any real money, and the same with the casino, definitely dont fall for that free spin malarkey as you end up spending your money.

Couple of suggestions. 1. Clear the previous search. Very annoying when you start a new search and previous is still there. Previous search is saved in list anyway. 2. When selecting match from inplay list, do not reset list to the top. Leave inplay list in previous position when returning to it.

Constantly crashing, good luck try ing put and Accumulator on pick one selection, go to the next and crash, reopen app or site repeat process 30 times get annoyed eventually give up when it's already halftime! And yet again 22 time in a row your app crashes whilst trying to put on bets, well the fun has stopped and so have I with this site!
Good site, but rubbish offers compared to the other bet sites. Avoid the one sided blackjack games.fair my a***, saying that, it's designed to make you broke. Fast payout though. That's good.

Website not app related: your prompt to create a "simpler" 4 digit passcode for logging in feels extremely irresponsible and is very frustrating having to dismiss that prompt on every login. Any service holding all sorts of personal data and banking information should be setting more strict password requirements, not allowing something like a 4 digit PIN for access to an account with just an email address. Very poorly thought out from a data security POV.

The worst betting app ever! I've made an account and as soon as I topped it up as little as £5. They've locked me out stating I have previously created an account with them in reality I actually have not. They also stated my account would be deactivated and I would only be able to reactivate it after 5 years which is an absolute joke! Do not download nor use this app.
Not opening. Circle of death. Skybet! !!!

The best around bar none imo from time to time there are small issues but nothing that doesn't get sorted quick. Would like a Today's matches on the football main page rather than clicking next 12 hrs then hitting 24hrs, but aside from that it's one of the best.
At times it is impossible to connect to this app. I've uninstalled and reinstalled it a few times. Had enough, gone onto SKY bet 🤨

Rubbish can never get into the app each time i try go into it, it seams to be buffering all I see is the green screen with the bet 365 and a circle that never stops spinning, i can never seem to get past that , i've tried opening and closing it but still the same.
Bet365 is best amongst all bookmakers because it has cashout option.Thank you Bet365

Great easy to use betting app with lots of betting options. As a gambling novice I found it great, help line are very informative and helpful, stake money can be as little as 10p so handy as you are feeling your way and not losing too much, keeps it fun as it should be.

Bet365 used to be good but now its near impossible to connect! Anytime I'm on wifi anywhere it just sits loading and never connects. Had this problem for several weeks now. If i dont have 4g+ signal I simply connot get online. Please try to fix this

I have no idea what happened but this app doesn't work anymore. It literally just stays on the loading screen when you open it. I've uninstalled and reinstalled numerous times and still nothing. I have a note 9

If I could give it no stars I would when I placed an acca I put the wrong team on so on numerous occasions I tried to change it but as my other bets were coming in the 1 I was trying to change would of won me about £50+ It said the system was down & wouldn't let me cash out I went on the online help & they were useless I explained what had happened they said we'll look into that then 10 minutes later said you placed this bet whatever it was thanks goodbye I'd use another betting site definitely
No problems, good service
Inplay with ray best bookies for accurate information
Watch out with this app, they will not update the scores, for example if is 1-1, you bet draw and you will find out is 2-1, this after you placed your bet. Be careful with this app.

Signed up for the£100 bet and get £100 back in bet credits. Lost the first 100 and moved on to bet credits. Then after a week or so my account was suspended, I'm still unsure as to why. I had a successful bet of winnings of £40 that has been removed from my account though I have a screenshot to prove it. In addition I have 22 bet credits which cannot be withdrawn or bet upon. So I have been banned with a net loss of £55. Replied to the message sent but no help was given.
Excellent app cannot fault it at the moment
